title: Anyone else not getting blue essence after your matches??
body: Seeing it was combined with IP, you used to get IP every match if I am correct??? Almost every match now I have not received any Blue Essence? What am I missing here? Glitch? Or did they change it so it takes longer to get champs using IP/BE?  Which would force us to spend money? Just wondering?

replies.body: BE is received after receiving a champion capsule when leveling up. You can disenchant the champion shards you get from the capsule for BE.

> [{quoted}](name=SteveTheMiner,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TtdoPywP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-20T22:12:33.782+0000)
>
> BE is received after receiving a champion capsule when leveling up. You can disenchant the champion shards you get from the capsule for BE.

This is correct. BE was always gained by disenchanting shards you didn't want, so that has stayed the same. You can get BE a little easier now though since you get those capsules on every level-up.
Ok so we don't get every match. K thanks man for the answer. Can't say I like the idea but oh well.
